data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Cayo, Belize.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cayo, Belize
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Cayo, Belize.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Cayo, Belize.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help the people of the the state of Cayo to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Cayo, Belize to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, English-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, English-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, English-speaking people is yours.
Father, move the 23,963 believers in the state of Cayo to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Cayo, Belize and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Cayo will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.
